title: Debunking Fitness and Diet Myths and Fads
description:
Jillian and the crew discuss quieting your mind for clarity. Plus, how do you know what to believe when there are so many conflicting medical studies out there; and a caller who wants to help her son through his emotional eating.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
